thread.title: David Beckham enjoyed secret romps in Harvester car park
thread.title_full: David Beckham enjoyed secret romps in Harvester car park

title: David Beckham enjoyed secret romps in Harvester car park
text:
WENN/GOOGLE ROMANTIC: Victoria and David Beckham used to enjoy secret trysts in a Harvester car park 
The former Manchester United star said he and wife Victoria used to meet up outside the popular restaurant chain when they were dating. 
The love birds would kiss and “spend time together” in his car, the former England captain said. 
But Becks also admitted their marriage has been “difficult”– and he had made “mistakes” over the years. Spice Girl Victoria Beckham Friday, 17th April 2015 Spice Girl Victoria Beckham celebrates her 41st birthday today! We've rounded up our 41 favourite pictures of the fashion designer to celebrate. Happy birthday Posh! 1 / 42 Victoria Beckham: from bad fashion to fashion designer “You make mistakes over the year” David Beckham 
The 41-year-old dad-of-four opened up about his marriage to fashion designer Victoria on the 75th anniversary edition of radio show Desert Island Discs. 
The former Real Madrid and LA Galaxy midfielder said: "We all know marriage is difficult at times and it's about working through it. 
"We know each other better than anyone knows us. 
"We've got strong parents – we were brought up with the right values. 
WENN HARD TIMES: Becks admitted their marriage had been difficult 
“Of course you make mistakes over the years. 
“Whenever we've come through tough times we talk." 
WENN FAMILY TIME: David and Victoria with sons Brooklyn, Romeo and Cruz and daughter Harper 
Becks denied he and Posh Spice stayed together for “Brand Beckham”. The ultimate celebrity tattoos Wednesday, 18th May 2016 From One Directioners Liam Payne and Harry Styles to Rita Ora, we've got the ultimate catalogue of celebrity tattoos... 1 / 47 Getty Cheryl shows off her new breast tattoo in plunging playsuit at Cannes 
The multimillionaire said: “We stay together because we love each other – we stay together because we have four amazing children.” 
He said that when the couple first started dating they spend their dates in his "amazing bright blue" BMW in order to keep the relationship private. 
"I drove down, I picked her up...we used to sit in a Harvester car park and we just used to kiss, of course, and spend time together." 
Desert Island Discs airs on BBC Radio 4 on Sunday at 11.15am Related articles
